venue.address_2: Union Square, opp. Jackson Mann School & Twin Donuts
venue.name: Grasshopper All-Vegan Restaurant

item.description:
Boston Vegetarian Society will once again be sponsoring a New Year’s Day event at Grasshopper Vegan Restaurant in Boston. http://grasshopperveg... I have attended this event in the past and it was worth the drive in to the city. Reservations are needed http://www.bostonveg.... so don’t delay if you are interested in attending.

See the topic on our site if you are interested in carpooling.


Here is some info from the BVS website: Don't miss our traditional New Year's Day Banquets! A time to launch the New Year with good cheer and compassion in the warm and welcoming company of the veg community. This vegan feast at Grasshopper is legendary, so do join in!

Reservations are needed. Noon and 3 PM seatings. Details will be posted soon, so please check back.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Vegetarian Society New Year’s Day Event
